title: I feel like Zhoyas is the reason mages can't have better AP defense items.
body:
Just think of it. Look at all the cool damage defense items AD have.

{{item:3156}} {{item:3072}} {{item:3153}} {{item:3812}} {{item:3074}} {{item:3046}} {{item:3026}} {{item:3814}} 

But when you look at ap
{{item:3157}} {{item:3040}} {{item:3102}}  Thes items all have massive cooldowns and zero sustain defense.

Why can't AP get better AP defense items? I feel like Zhonyas might be taking too much off the power budget from AP defense itemisation (because of the way it can complete ignore vast amounts of damage) and thus riot won't give AP any more defense items.


If thats the case, can't we at least get alernatives to Zhonyas? Similar to {{item:3036}} {{item:3033}} ? I honestly don't like Zhonyas and it kinda sucks that it is the main defense item for AP fighters like Diana.

Man, Im really getting sick of this mage bs. First of all lifesteal isnt a defensive item, if that was true then {{item:3027}} would be a defensive item because it gives you health for casting spells but that isnt the reason it is. The defensive items are {{item:3026}} {{item:3156}} {{item:3812}} {{item:3046}} {{item:3814}}  {{item:3072}}  and for some reason you forgot {{item:3053}}? And ya it is not because zhonya's is so strong, but because they dont want mages becoming tanks. Mages have large health pools with their items. Add a second defensive item and they will reach mid tank level. Honestly it isnt that hard to understand if you want alot of defense then build it, the proper tank items. You know the difference between a mage and a assassin that builds maw and eon with bc in a full lethality build they have 650 bonus health. With the new ap items you can get bonus 1100 health ( new morello + new liandry + RoA) Or for some assassins maybe swap the RoA for {{item:3152}}  thats 900 bonus health. Now another thing is mages seem to want to pretend that health isnt one of the most useful defensive stats in the game, just to get another defensive item. What helps against, ad, ap and even true dmg HEALTH. Regardless of the dmg more health means more dmg you can take because you die. Thats why tanks seem unfair because they naturally have more health to take dmg while also having higher base dmg to dish it. 

Mages dont get defensive items because they can build tank and deal massive amounts of dmg if they get more, whether its ad or ap.

What on earth could be a _better_ defensive item than Zhonya's Hourglass? You get a huge chunk of armor, some AP, cooldown reduction, and an active that negates Zed's ultimate, prevents you from being knocked up by Yasuo, makes Talon's ult useless, prevents Rengar's leap crit, saves you from Kha'Zix...basically the only AD assassin that could kill you through Hourglass is Shaco, and that's because Shaco has a bullshit 4.5 second stealth. What do you mean by 'better' defensive items? 

As for 'sustained defense', you have that as well. You just don't build it, and you never have. {{item:3146}} . Hextech Revolver gave spell vamp for six fucking years and you lot never bought it. Clearly, you value your burst more than your sustained defense, and Riot acted appropriately. That was the power of the consumer, based on data. If you want items to stick around, you have to buy them and use them.

{{item:3157}} should be be more of a squishy mage item because a battle mage shouldn't fear getting into a brawl and they should have better scaling on their abilities to make room for proper defensive items, similar to fighters as they also have to get at least one tank item if they hope to be semi-tanky. What mages need are more defined armor options so they can semi-brawl or tank damage from Physical damage dealers.

That's not how battle mages work. For reference, these are battle mages: {{champion:136}} {{champion:69}} {{champion:8}} {{champion:50}} {{champion:30}} {{champion:268}} {{champion:127}} and arguably {{champion:9}}. Each one of them fear being in the middle of a fight without Zhonya up.

Yes they can be tanky, but they must stack damage or else they won't do anything.  If you give someone like Vladimir or Cassiopeia better scaling, then it's like an adc getting a free bloodthirster. Unlike fighters, these battle mages do not have high MS, mobility, invulnerability (except vlad), or base stats to aid their survival. Since they're ranged they can't have tools like Fiora or Camille.
Mages aren't suppose to be tanky, they are suppose to deal tons of damage.
